{{cpp/title|{{small|generator&lt;Ref,V,Allocator&gt;::promise_type::}}operator delete}}
{{cpp/coroutine/generator/navbar}}
{{ddcl|since=c++23|
void operator delete( void* ptr, std::size_t n ) noexcept;
}}

Deallocates the storage pointed to by {{c|ptr}} using an allocator equivalent to that used to {{rlp|operator new|allocate}} this memory.

The {{c|ptr}} passed to this function must be the one returned from an invocation of one of the {{rlpt|operator new}} overloads with a size argument equal to {{c|n}}. Otherwise the behavior is undefined.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|ptr|a pointer obtained from the previous call to {{rlpt|operator new}}}}
{{par|n|the size of the storage to be deallocated}}
{{par end}}
